code: import{useState}from'react';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const GetContract=_ref=>{let{account,central}=_ref;const[contractAddress,setContractAddress]=useState('');const[walletAddress,setWalletAddress]=useState('');function showErrorMessage(error){alert("An error occurred while connecting to MetaMask: ".concat(error.message));}const handleInput1Change=e=>{setWalletAddress(e.target.value);};const fetchContractAddress=async()=>{try{if(walletAddress){const address=await central.getCompanySmartContractAddress(walletAddress);setContractAddress(address);}else{throw new Error('Enter wallet address');}}catch(error){console.log(error);showErrorMessage(error);}};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"GetContract",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h3",{className:"Component__title",children:"Fetch Assosciated Contract Address"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"Component__form",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"form__content",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("label",{className:"form__label",children:"Enter Company wallet address"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"text",className:"form__input",value:walletAddress,onChange:handleInput1Change})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{className:"button__toggle form__button",onClick:fetchContractAddress,children:"Fetch Address"}),contractAddress&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{children:["Result: ",contractAddress]})]})]});};export default GetContract;
